p: AaVV is one of two viruses detected in the F 2 generation of colony GH 115 ( Table 1). AaVV has at least three ORFs in its genome and forms a clade with the unclassified viruses closely related to the family Virgaviridae and the Negevirus taxon ( Figure 11) [ 45]. AaVV was not successfully transmitted to the F 3 generation.
